title: Sidee loo Xisaabiyaa Mushahaarada Darawalka Taksiiga Bolt ama Uber?
author: Taxiadministration
excerpt: Ma wadataa taksi apps sida Bolt ama Uber? Halkan waxaan si fudud ugu sharxaynaa sida mushahaaradaada loo xisaabiyayo iyo waxa aad ka fikri lahayd.
content:
Haddii aad taksi ku wadatid apps sida Bolt ama Uber, waa muhiim inaad fahamto sida mushahaaradaada runtii loo xisaabinayo. Way ka duwan tahay wadista taksiiga dhaqameed.

Sidee u shaqeeyaa

Bolt iyo Uber si toos ah uma shaqaaleeyo darawalada. Taa beddelkeeda, waxay u shaqaaleeya shirkadaha taksiiga sidii qandaraas yar-yar. Taasi waxay ka dhigan tahay in adiga darawal ahaan lagu shaqaaleeyo shirkad taksi – maaha app-ka.

Marka macmiilka lacag bixiyo safar, app-ku wuxuu qaataa gunno qiyaastii 25% lacagta. Intii hadhay waxay aadaysaa shirkadda taksiiga aad u wadato. Wixii ka hadha, adiga darawal ahaan waxaad qaadataa sida caadiga ah 40-50% mushahaarkii.

Tusaale muuqda

Safar 23 km ah wuxuu soo saari karaa qiyaastii 191 SEK ka dib gunnada Uber. Tan, adiga darawal shaqaale ah waxaad heshaa 40-50% – qiyaastii 75-95 SEK.

Safar dheer 220 km ah wuxuu soo saari karaa qiyaastii 1,379 SEK ka dib gunnadaha. Qaybtiinna waxay noqon lahayd qiyaastii 550-700 SEK.

Maxaa dhammaadka ku hadhaya?

Sida warbixinnada, darawal Bolt ah oo si buuxa u shaqeeya oo ay ku jiraan habeennadii dambeeya ayaa kasbi kara qiyaastii 18,000 SEK/bil. Tan waxaa lagu barbar dhigi karaa mushahaarada la dammaanado ee heshiiska wadajirka ah ee darawalada taksiiga qiyaastii 23,337 SEK.

Talooyinka

  • Had iyo jeer weyddii qeexitaanka mushahaarada si aad u aragto si sax ah waxaad heshay
  • Hubi in shirkadda taksiigaaga leedahay heshiis wadajir ah – sidoo kale waxay saameyn ku leedahay mushahaaradaada fasaxa
  • Xisaabi saacadahaaga dhabta ah – ma ahan oo keliya mayl aad wadatay

Ma leedahay xakamayn mushahaaradaada? Qalabka saxda ah, way fududaan kartaa inaad aragto waxaad dhab ahaantii kasbanaysid.

Ma rabtaa xakamayn ka fiican maalgashadaada?

Taxiadministration, waxaad heshaa xisaabinta automatikoobsan ee mushahaarada iyo warbixinno cad.
